text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha chaur puok anak brab khnhom mk brasenbae a l laoh dk yk kar lyy ning kar kheunh robsa puok anak haey trong baohtra phchit towleu chetd robsa puok anaknoh tae mean mcheasa na phe sa ng pi a l laoh nung phdal vea aoy puok anak vinh? chaur anak meulchoh tae yeung banhcheak phosdo tang neanea brab puokke yeang dauch me d ch khleah banteab mk puokke nowte ngeak chenh ddel noh
